lead_paragraph: A Florida developer has offered $90 million for the Revel Casino Hotel that shut down last week, lawyers for the resort said Wednesday in court documents.

headline.main: Revel Says It Has $90M Offer to Buy Closed Casino
headline.print_headline: Revel Says It Has $90M Offer to Buy Closed Casino
